title: Typography and the Aging Eye - an AIGA study
content:
The [AIGA](http://web.archive.org/wiki/AIGA) has an interesting piece — with accompanying diagrams — on the aspects and effects of aging, on vision.

Worth a read: [Typography and the Aging Eye](http://web.archive.org/web/20060504203144/http:/designforum.aiga.org/content.cfm?ContentAlias=%5Fgetfullarticle&aid=1415414)
author: Joe Pemberton
